presentation.name: Plinio Netto
presentation.subTitle: Fullstack Web Developer
presentation.description:
Welcome to my digital realm!
I'm Plinio Netto, a full-stack web developerbased in Brazil, specialized in React.js, Node.js and Next.js. With a passion for crafting seamless web experiences, I bring together innovation and expertise. Explore my portfolio, where I expose fancy solutions combined with full responsiveness and special care for accessibility and user experience!
